get.summary: Get a protected file associated with a model target.
get.description:
Serves a file linked to a specific model target instance (e.g., an application's attachments, a project's documents).
 - Requires authentication.
 - Used for file purpose with cardinality of **many**.
 - This endpoint URLs are made **ONLY** by the API on specifics resources.

parameters.name: uuidfile
parameters.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the specific file if purpose carry a **many** cardinality.

schema.description: The raw file content. Content-Type and Content-Length headers will indicate the specific file type and size.
